response.overview: We follow a day in the relationship of Mildred, who is head over heels for her beau Eddie. However, his eyes wander enough to put Don Juan to shame. Under the chagrined gaze of Eros, we must wonder if these lovers can work it out.
response.tagline: We follow a day in the relationship of Mildred, who is head over heels for her beau Eddie. However, his eyes wander enough to put Don Juan to shame. Under the chagrined gaze of Eros, we must wonder if these lovers can work it out.
response.title: I Love You Truly!
